column4: when you finger a user, why does it say "no plan"? kind of insulting to the user...
the user would have to have a .plan file in his home dir to show it. It is a public plan.
do you have "virus protection on" in your bios? it would keep grub from installing to the mbr...?
it actually worked after, when I chose to install to whole HD, and I used a breezy preview install CD instead of Hoary.
